issue.title: VMWare throwing an error when launching gazebo

content.raw: Has this been addressed in a later version of Gazebo \(after v9\)? Is this a VMWare problem or a Gazebo issue? Downgrading OpenGL or turning off 3D Acceleration is not an acceptable solution for me. It defeats the purpose of using VMWare over Parallels \(since VMWare supports OpenGL 3.0, while Parallels is still stuck at OpenGL 2.1\).
content.html: Has this been addressed in a later version of Gazebo (after v9)? Is this a VMWare problem or a Gazebo issue? Downgrading OpenGL or turning off 3D Acceleration is not an acceptable solution for me. It defeats the purpose of using VMWare over Parallels (since VMWare supports OpenGL 3.0, while Parallels is still stuck at OpenGL 2.1).
